title: 268: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 2 with Mikayla Bartholomew (of The Blckchelorette’s)!
itunes:title: 268: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 2 with Mikayla Bartholomew (of The Blckchelorette’s)!
description:
It’s time to recap Katie’s second episode and The Broads are joined by one of their faves Mikayla Bartholomew (The Blckchelorettes)! They chat about their thoughts on Katie, Mike’s virginity storyline, Karl’s 18 minute presentation, Connor B’s makeout session, Greg’s one on one date, the conformation of Aaron and Cody’s previous “relationship”, Katie’s confrontation, who they are loving and who they are not trusting so far this season, and a wholllleeee lot more!

MIKAYLA BARTHOLOMEW:

Check out “The Blckchelorettes”patreon here:

https://www.patreon.com/theblckchelorettes?l=fr

Podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-blckchelorettes-with-vic-and-mi/id1549622003

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theblckchelorettes/?hl=en

Mikayla’s website: https://www.mikaylabartholomew.com/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/carpeingdiem/?hl=en
